parameters.definition: Number of monkeys that can be transported per bus trip
Number of monkeys that can be transported per car trip
Maximum number of bus trips allowed
Minimum proportion of trips that must be by car
Total number of monkeys to be transported

description: A zoo needs to transport their monkeys to the vet either by bus or by car. A bus can transport \param{BusCapacity} monkeys per trip and takes \param{BusDuration} minutes. A car can transport \param{CarCapacity} monkeys per trip and takes \param{CarDuration} minutes. There can be at most \param{MaxBusTrips} bus trips. In addition, since the monkeys get aggressive when there are too many in one place at least \param{MinCarTripProportion} of the trips should be by car. If the zoo needs to transport \param{TotalMonkeys} monkeys, how many trips of each should be done to minimize the total time required to transport the monkeys?
